summary: THE FRONT WINDSHIELD WIPERS WILL SUDDENLY STOP WORKING WHEN IT IS RAINING.  THEY WILL COME BACK ON AFTER A FEW MINUTES OR MAYBE NOT AT ALL.  YESTERDAY THEY DID NOT COME ON AT ALL,  TODAY THEY WORKED FOR ABOUT AN HOUR AND THEN THEY JUST STOP.  THIS HAS BEEN GOING ON FOR THE LAST MONTH.  THE REAR WIPERS DO FINE.    *NLM
